text: Rice requires 120-150 days to mature. Transplant 25-30 day old seedlings at 20x15 cm spacing.
Apply 60:40:40 kg/ha NPK for wheat. Split application: 50% at sowing, 25% at tillering, 25% at flowering.
Monitor for yellow rust in wheat during February-March. Apply fungicide if disease severity exceeds 10%.
Sugarcane requires 12-18 months. Plant in February-March or September-October. Maintain soil moisture.
Cotton bollworm control: Apply Bt cotton or spray recommended insecticides at 5-7 day intervals.
Maize responds well to irrigation at knee-high, tasseling, and grain-filling stages. Avoid waterlogging.
Groundnut requires 90-120 days. Plant in June-July for kharif. Maintain proper spacing of 30x10 cm.
Apply 20:40:20 kg/ha NPK for pulses. Inoculate seeds with Rhizobium for better nitrogen fixation.
